text: Konstantin Aghaparoni Orbelyan (, ; 29 July 1928 - 24 April 2014) was an Armenian-American pianist, conductor and composer. He was Head of the State Estrada Orchestra of Armenia. He was born in Armavir, Russia (then Soviet Union). Orbelyan died on 29 April 2014 in Los Angeles, California of the United States. He was 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Konstantin Orbelyan at the Armenian State Jazz Band website Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American composers Category:American conductors Category:American jazz musicians Category:American pianists Category:Armenian composers Category:Disease-related deaths in Los Angeles Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Konstantin Orbelyan
